a.userid, a.username, a.company, a.logo, a.msgNotify, a.userType, a.backgroundPic, a.appletCarouselPic, a.digest, a.themecolor, a.defaultPhoto, a.refreshCount, a.cardText, a.cardPic, a.subAccount, a.faceScaner, a.webwalkins, a.preExtendTime, a.latExtendTime, a.keyExpireTime, a.leaveExpiryTime, a.questionnaireSwitch, a.escapeClause, a.fsNotify, a.wxBusNotify, a.notifyType, a.carouselPic, e.ddnotify, e.qrcode, e.qrcodeSwitch, e.qrcodeType, e.custReqUrl, e.bindingType, e.comeAgain, e.printType, e.cardType, e.cardSize, e.cardLogo, e.custSource, e.custWeb, e.custAddress, e.remark, e.smsCount, e.wxSmsCount, e.appSmsCount, e.unsubscribe, e.preRegisterSwitch, e.scaner, e.ivrNotify, e.ivrPrint, e.permissionSwitch, e.idCardSwitch, e.signOutSwitch, e.tempEditSwitch, e.blackListSwitch, e.processSwitch, e.secureProtocol, e.upDuty, e.offDuty, e.qrMaxCount, e.qrMaxDuration, e.badgeMode, e.badgeCustom, e.brandType, e.brandPosition, e.showAvatar, e.avatarType, e.customText, e.passableSTime, e.passableETime, e.satisfactionQuestionnaire, e.dataKeepTime
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qcv_users ( userid, username, password, email, phone, company, msgNotify, emailType, userType, regDate, defaultPhoto, expireDate ) VALUES ( #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{msgNotify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{emailType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{regDate}, #{defaultPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expireDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM qcv_users a LEFT JOIN qcv_user_extend e ON a.userid=e.userid

SELECT
FROM `qcv_users` a WHERE userid IN (SELECT e.userid FROM `qcv_employee` e,`qcv_notify_conf` c WHERE e.`openid`=c.`openid` and c.openid=#{openid}) ORDER BY a.loginDate DESC LIMIT 0,1

SELECT
FROM qcv_users a LEFT JOIN qcv_user_extend e ON a.userid=e.userid
where a.username like "%"#{username}"%" or a.company like "%"#{username}"%"
order by ${orderType} desc
order by regDate desc

SELECT
FROM qcv_users a LEFT JOIN qcv_user_extend e ON a.userid=e.userid where e.ddnotify=1 and e.ddautosync=1
SELECT e.permanentCode, e.corpid, e.agentid FROM qcv_user_extend e where e.userid=#{userid}
SELECT FROM qcv_user_extend e where e.userid=#{userid}
mapper.insert: UPDATE qcv_users SET emailType = #{emailType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, emailAccount= #{emailAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emailPwd=#{emailPwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smtp=#{smtp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, smtpPort=#{smtpPort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, exchange=#{exchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, domain=#{domain,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE userid = #{userid}

UPDATE qcv_user_extend SET ddnotify=#{ddnotify}, ddautosync=#{ddautosync}, ddcorpid=#{ddcorpid}, ddcorpsecret=#{ddcorpsecret}, ddagentid=#{ddagentid} , ddAppid=#{ddAppid} , ddAppSccessSecret=#{ddAppSccessSecret} WHERE userid = #{userid}

UPDATE qcv_user_extend SET printType=#{printType}, cardType=#{cardType}, cardSize=#{cardSize}, cardLogo=#{cardLogo}, badgeMode=#{badgeMode}, badgeCustom=#{badgeCustom}, brandType=#{brandType}, brandPosition=#{brandPosition}, showAvatar=#{showAvatar}, avatarType=#{avatarType}, customText=#{customText} WHERE userid = #{userid}

INSERT INTO qcv_user_extend ( userid, ddnotify, ddcorpid, ddcorpsecret, ddagentid, qrcode, qrcodeSwitch, qrcodeType ) VALUES ( #{userid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ddnotify,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ddcorpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddcorpsecret,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ddagentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qrcodeSwitch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{qrcodeType,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
